todos.title: Control
todos.body: You cannot run a business by being a control freak.  You will lose everything.

todos.title: Reverse Question
todos.body: When asked a question, ask what would you do if I wasn’t here.

todos.title: Training v Management
todos.body: Separate who trains from who manages.

todos.title: Favorites
todos.body: Love all workers but don’t be afraid to play favorites to the top 20%.  They deserve to be rewarded for their moments in the sun.

todos.title: Time Management
todos.body: Have you been managing your time so that you are not overwhelmed but are available at certain times to help.

todos.title: Don’t Micromanage
todos.body: Clearly describe the goals and constraints and let them figure out the methods.

todos.title: Right Seat
todos.body: Are the people you are working with in the right seat.

todos.title: Don’t assume that your way is the only or best way.
